column5: But parking is insane!!!  I am in a parking lot stealing wireless  :)  Weather is great, I'm actually sweating... I dunno if that's from the heat or my being out of shape    I'll grab pics of any monsters that I pull outta here (ya right)  Wish me luck!!!!!
oh man good luck, i was planning to go this morning but couldnt wake, maybe this afternoon :S
Good luck , cant wait to see some pike!  And as far as I'm concerned, it's not stealing if they don't bother to put security on their wireless
Best of luck Bill, but why on earth did you take your puter on a fishin trip ??
Especially when the hotel advertises right on their marque... "Free High Speed Internet"

Google earth is great for finding fishing holes   Plus I don't know Toronto to well so atleast I have some kind of gameplan, lol  No fish to report, no follows, nothing.   Perhaps the water is a tad bit to cold for these fish yet, ah well..  Felt great tossing the baitcaster..  Weather is awesome down here, if anyone is planning on giving it a shot, today is the day...   (Still stealing wireless  )
WOW...technology eh !!!!!...fishing with your lap-top..  .oh well good luck,and hope you get a big early spring pike !!!!....cheers
alright bill! good luck out there! we were out yesterday, didnt even get a follow. perhaps a tad cold still.. i'll try again in a week or two.  kevin

Great stuff Bill.  I saw all that open water when I left the short show and almost went back to buy a cheap rig just so I could toss something.  Drove with the sunroof open the whole way, what a nice day.
i thought there is a FREE wireless zone from the lake up to Bloor street that Hydro put in place?
